# LLM-Optimized Sitemap for HelpStash

# Main Pages
Homepage: https://helpstash.app/
Support: https://helpstash.app/support
Privacy Policy: https://helpstash.app/privacy
Terms of Service: https://helpstash.app/terms

# App Information
App Name: HelpStash
Category: Financial Wellness / Impulse Purchase Prevention
Platform: iOS
Price: Free (with optional Premium subscription)
Pricing Model: Freemium - Free to download with optional monthly or yearly Premium subscription. Includes 1-month free trial.
Description: HelpStash is a financial wellness app that helps users pause impulse purchases with timers, breathing exercises, and streak tracking. The app uses behavioral interventions to help build better spending habits.

# Key Features
- Set pause timers before making purchase decisions
- Guided breathing exercises to redirect impulse urges
- Track consecutive days with completed pauses
- Monitor savings from resisted impulse purchases
- View insights about spending triggers and patterns
- Receive gentle reminders when pause timers complete

# Use Cases
- Preventing impulse purchases
- Building better spending habits
- Financial wellness and awareness
- Mindful spending practices
- Breaking the cycle of impulse buying

# Technical Details
Language: English
Availability: iOS App Store
App Store URL: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/helpstash-stop-impulse-spend/id6755245373
Website: https://helpstash.app
